content.query:
CREATE TABLE fire.stg_calls_2001
	(
	 [dataType] varchar(100),
	 [dataSubtype] varchar(100),
	 [dateTime] datetime2(7),
	 [category] varchar(100),
	 [subcategory] varchar(100),
	 [status] varchar(100),
	 [address] varchar(100),
	 [latitude] float,
	 [longitude] float,
	 [source] varchar(100),
	 [extendedProperties] varchar(100)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
	);
GO

COPY INTO fire.stg_calls_2001
(dataType 1, dataSubtype 2, dateTime 3, category 4, subcategory 5, status 6, address 7, latitude 8, longitude 9, source 10, extendedProperties 11)
FROM 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=2001'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
);
GO

-- tempo di esecuzione:(220311 records affected) Total execution time: 00:11:18.110 

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM fire.stg_calls_2001;
GO
